properties.name: description
properties.description: Responsible for the main content placed by the center of it, could be replaced with slot, but the main priority have description property

properties.name: actionText
properties.description: Responsible for the text that displays on the bottom

properties.name: action
properties.description: Responsible for the action that could be dispatched by 'action' event if we have that property

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Responsible for the source of the display icon

properties.name: height
properties.description: Responsible for the content tab height

properties.name: width
properties.description: Responsible for the content tab width

events.name: action
events.description: Dispatched next values like action or actionText props for detecting on which content tab the click was triggered
